identity.name: Datalyn
identity.description: The AI-powered agentic business analyst that connects to your data and explains the 'why' behind the numbers.

rules: Headings must strictly use 'tracking-tight' to achieve the premium SaaS look.
Never use pure black text. Use slate-900 for headings, slate-600 for body.
Use 'tabular-nums' for all data/metrics to ensure alignment.

colors.mode_strategy: Light mode default, subtle Dark mode toggle in settings

dashboard_grid.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 p-4 md:p-6
dashboard_grid.rules: Use col-span-1 for simple metrics, col-span-2 for charts, col-span-full for complex reports.

buttons.default: h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all duration-200 active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-lg shadow-[0_1px_3px_0_rgb(0,0,0,0.1),0_1px_2px_-1px_rgb(0,0,0,0.1)] hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

inputs.style: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-200 bg-transparent px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-white file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-500 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-slate-900 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

chat_bubbles.user: bg-slate-100 text-slate-900 rounded-2xl rounded-tr-sm px-4 py-3
chat_bubbles.ai: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-800 rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm px-6 py-4 shadow-sm w-full

visual_enhancers.shadows: Use diffuse, subtle shadows. Avoid harsh black shadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid slate-200 is the primary divider. No thick borders.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for sticky headers: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-200/50.
visual_enhancers.gradients: AVOID colorful gradients. Use subtle 'slate-50 to white' gradients for backgrounds.

image_urls.logo_instructions: Use Lucide-React icons for integration logos. Do NOT use external images for logos as they look messy. Use 'Sheet', 'FileText', 'Slack', 'CreditCard' icons.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPLEMENTATION ORDER: Auth Pages -> Dashboard Layout -> Dashboard Metrics -> AI Chat Interface -> Landing Page -> Integrations/Settings.
2. DASHBOARD: Ensure the dashboard is populated with realistic MOCK DATA. It must look 'lived in'. Use Recharts for the 30-day trend line.

3. AI CHAT: This is the core feature. Use a 'ChatProvider' context to manage state. The AI response must parse 'reasoning steps' if provided (you can mock the backend response structure to include steps). Display these steps in a collapsible 'Reasoning' accordion.
4. INTEGRATIONS: These are UI-only. Use a nice 'Switch' component (from shadcn) to toggle them.
5. LANDING PAGE: Must be pixel-perfect. Use the provided 'hero_background' as a subtle visual element, perhaps masked or placed on the right side.
6. USE SHADCN: Heavily rely on the installed shadcn components in /components/ui. Do not reinvent the wheel for Select, Dialog, Sheet, etc.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not center align the App container.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
